name: Nox

files.installer:
N/A:Select the game's setup file. Download it here: 
https://www.gog.com/downloads/nox/en1installer0

content:
files:
- installer: "N/A:Select the game's setup file. Download it here: \nhttps://www.gog.com/downloads/nox/en1installer0"
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Nox/NOX.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /NOGUI
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  reset_desktop: true
wine:
  Desktop: false
